name: Ghost Horses Limited
description:
Ghosthorses.co.uk is a web design portfolio and shameless promotional vehicle used to display the web design & development work of Stephen Fairbanks.
We’re not a web design factory. We’re the plucky rebels, not the galactic empire. There’s no blowing up planets to prove our power, and there’s no ‘bish bosh, job done, whooooozneeext’ – just carefully crafted websites designed and built with love and affection.
